quest.name: A Delicate Operation
journal:
Eshana is in need of an adventurer in high places.

â€»Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Use the botanical growth formula to obtain dianthuses.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: You do not fear heightsss, do you? We have need of one who can scale the rock formations of Virdjala to procure dianthus.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Tea made from their petals is incredibly effective at reducing fatigue. Alpa thought to offer it to travelers ssseeking lodgings after a long journey.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: The problem, however, is the flowers are quite delicate, and should they be bruised, their curative properties are greatly diminished.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Luckily for usss, a traveling alchemist taught us how to create a botanical growth formula.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Sssprinkle this upon the flowers and they will remain unharmed when plucked.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You find the flower Eshana spoke of, and it is in full bloom. At a glance you can tell the petals are dreadfully delicate.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The delicate petals of the flower seem hardened by Eshana's growth formula.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Were you able to find the flowers?

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: It seems the growth formula was more effective than I had hoped. A pity such beauty must be sssacrificed to make our tea.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: The recipe was taught to us by a merchant of Ul'dah. A peculiar fellow who insssisted on trading for our shedded skin. Rather than barter for gold, we sssettled on information beneficial to our work here.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: There is much knowledge to be shared with travelers coming and going between Gyr Abania and the Shroud. I pray we can count on your aid to ensure their sssafe passage.
